page.title: 10HOME LIFE PAISLEY
page.content: { A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LAURA During Morning Interval we played{High {Tig,}someone goes chaser and tries to tig people who are on low ground. Everyone on high ground is safe but if the chaser manages to tig someone that person has to be chaser. During lunch hour we played{ {Kiss,Cuddle or Torture.}-The boys chase the girls and if they manage to catch one they say Kiss,Cuddle or Torture? Whatever the girl chose the boy did. Everyone usually chooses torture. After school I watched television-John Craven's Newsround and Emmerdale Farm. After tea my dad and I took my sister Donna down to the{Fairway Club}which is for handicapped, disabled and able-bodied children.
